content: this crochet summer top uses the love knot stitch to create a flowy airy top it s the perfect crochet top for summer because it s super cute and it ll keep you cool this top has two separate straps to tie around the neck and at the back so it s relatively easy to get the perfect fit this free written pattern comes with a video tutorial to ensure that everything is perfectly clear pattern fits a size adult small and includes instructions to adjust sizing wherever applicable
